name: SpaceNewsDaily
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Get brief summaries of the latest developments in Space research. Several daily 10-30 second stories will keep you up to date with the latest research findings from astronomical observations and space travel research to new theories in astrophysics , For more information on any story visit sciencedaily.com. This skill is not officially endorsed by Science Daily.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
